pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mass Spectrometry Tools // Common mass spectrometry tools described in John Roboz (2013) doi:10.1201/b15436. It allows checking element isotopes, calculating (isotope labelled) exact monoisitopic mass, m/z values and mass accuracy, and inspecting possible contaminant mass peaks, examining possible adducts in electrospray ionization (ESI) and matrix-assisted laser desorption ionization (MALDI) ion sources.
